name: Captain Opera
description:
THE NEW FRONTIER: WIFI

In the distant year XXXX, humanity is on the brink of annihilation. One brave soul, Captain Opera, must now navigate the great cosmos in order to restore order to the planet.

On this journey, he will face many perils, enemies and obstacles in his way.

When he is low on ammo, he will take the scraps left behind by the foes he vanquishes. When he finds himself feint of heart, he knows one can be found near, in the great asteroids of space. And, of course, he will explore many new planets along the way.

His objective? Collect WiFi shards and bring them back to a home base for refinement! The bigger the WiFi score he can get, the better!

The whole world is counting on you!

GAME FEATURES:

Pilot a UFO and take on enemies and asteroids!

Discover a variety of different planets with mini-games!

Obtain WiFi shards to refine back at your home base!

Compatible with mobile browsers via touch controls!

Spawn enemy ships and asteroids as Player 2!

Endless arcade style game play!

Android version also available for mobile phones!

CREDITS:

Programmed & Designed By: Cody Brant

Art, Graphics & Music By: Tanner Eakin
